lift.description: Weapon size requirement and adds to total carrying capacity

athletics.description: Jump distance. Jump height is 1+ half. Also used for or certain physical skills

dodge.description: Base chance to be missed by an attack at normal distance, in the open, ideal range

critical chance.description: Chance that an attack or skill ignores resistance and doubles effect

technique.description: number of remembered active special actions or spells

speed.description: number of movement points per action

action.description: number of action points per turn

endurance.description: armor weight requirement and adds to total carrying capacity

attunement.description: number of simultaneous active magic items

mental.description: resist illusion and enchantment spells, reducing their power on hit and every turn

physical.description: resist abjuration spells and poison damage

reflex.description: resist initial effect of area of effect spells

damage.description: bonus to damage with each attack that hits

magic.description: damage of each magical or wand attack or power of each magical spell
